summary:
\"What the hell is that\"
\"It\'s my Urkel sleeping bag! Isn\'t it cool?\"
\"No, it\'s not cool!\"
descriptionHtml:
Do you think your copy of Skyrim needs more obscurity? Need to make people have significantly less serious thoughts about you? Want to freak out your friend when he wants to have a nice gaming experience? Then this is for you!

Force everyone in your little slice of Tamriel to sleep in a Urkel sleeping bag today, so everyone can share in the fun!
author: Sol the First
